A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
There was no gradual "passing of the torch" from these characters to the new generation\, It's like you hated these characters. It's like they where in your way and you rushed to get rid of them.

You turned Luke into a tired\, lazy\, grumpy old man who wanted nothing to do with the Force or the Jedi for that matter. WHO IN THERE RIGHT MIND WOULD DO THIS!!!

What's worse\, is that you really did nothing through-out the movie to fix this. You almost (somewhat) redeemed yourself having Luke face off with Kylo. But he wasn't even there to face him! He was  still stuck on that damn planet!! THEN\, he just dies!!! WHY!?!?!  it was't like he exuded any form of real energy!!

And Luke\, milking that...whatever the hell it was\, was just weird and wrong!

Then the rest of the movie...

What a cluster!!\, no real plot\, Leia floating through space like some sort of  space witch. Snoke just dies with no explanation for who he was or where he came from. No backstory with Rey.

J.J. you've got a mess to clean up. If it's even possible.
